Name: Ice Station Z
About the game: After a strange virus spreads across an Arctic Island, you are left all alone. Your mission is to survive for as many days as you can. Scavenge for food, drink, medical supplies, weapons, ammunition, clothes and fuel. Find shelters, vehicles and other interesting locations to help you survive. Ice Station Z was developed by Wobbly Tooth using the Unreal EngineÂ® and uses player hosted servers. A gamepad is recommended but it does support keyboard & mouse as well. Wobbly Tooth is a solo indie developer. For bugs and suggestions contact info@wobbly-tooth.com
